title: 1853 Booklets with baseball woodcut on cover
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 1853 Booklets with baseball woodcut on cover
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rick McQuillan
I bought 6 of these a couple of years ago, and I am ready to part with a couple.  These are Babcock's Moral, Instructive, and Amusing Toy books, published in New Haven by S. Babcock.  I have one of the books with writing inside the front cover which dates these to 1853.  (the book with the date is not one of the two that I am trading) One of the woodcut panels on the front cover appears to be kids playing baseball.

$25 each includes shipping and 100% satisfaction money back guarantee.

Thanks!  

Rick
